source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_00<tab>Jannequinard appears to have information on your next symposium.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_00<tab>Jannequinard a une bonne nouvelle pour vous.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_01<tab>The location of the next symposium has been chosen by the Vault, and it is even smaller and more secluded than the last─the Convictory in the lower basin of the Coerthas western highlands. Travel to the camp and speak with Leveva as to how you shall proceed.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_01<tab>Leveva est à nouveau motivée pour réaliser son projet de conférence sur l'astromancie. Rejoignez-la au Convictoire, dans les Hautes terres du Coerthas occidental.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_02<tab>Leveva feels that the board has been set for you to lose, so she decides not to play by the rules, and instead of holding a symposium, she suggests that you use your astromancy to grant succor to wounded Convictors in the form of Aspected Benefic.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez rejoint Leveva au Convictoire. Elle pense que vous devriez soigner quelques chevaliers blessés pour prouver la valeur de l'astromancie au régiment. Utilisez “Bienfaisance aspectée” sur trois d'entre eux.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_03<tab>The wounded knights you heal make miraculous recoveries. Speak with Leveva and ask her if there is aught else you can do.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez guéri les blessures des chevaliers. Retrouvez Leveva pour voir où elle en est.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_04<tab>Leveva is stabbed by a Sharlayan disguised as a wounded Convictor. However, she is no ordinary Sharlayan. A well-timed piece of exposition reveals her to be the same tattooed Sharlayan who has been attempting to kidnap Leveva since she arrived in the Black Shroud. She claims that she has been hired to bring Leveva back to the Old World, but you successfully drive her off before she can act. Join Jannequinard and cast Aspected Benefic on Leveva before her wound takes her.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_04<tab>L'astromancienne était en mauvaise posture au moment où vous l'avez rejointe. La chef des brigands qui vous poursuivent depuis le début s'était fait passer pour un membre des chevaliers locaux afin de tromper sa vigilance. Elle a menacé Leveva en lui disant qu'elle connaîtrait le même sort funeste que son père si elle n'abandonnait pas im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ses projets en rentrant à Sharlayan. Utilisez “Bienfaisance aspectée” sur Leveva pour la remettre d'aplomb.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_05<tab>Jannequinard reveals to Leveva that he knew her father, and that he was with him when he was killed. He hands over her father's diary, which the Ishgardian astrologian has been carrying around as a keepsake since the day Rufin passed. With renewed faith in her cause, Leveva decides to remain at the Convictory and use her magicks to heal more soldiers.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_05<tab>Après la fuite de la scélérate, Jannequinard a avoué à Leveva que son père, Rufin, était son ancien camarade d'études et lui a remis son journal intime. Le cœur de la Sharlayanaise n'a fait qu'un bond et elle s'est promis de tout faire pour réaliser le rêve de son père<var 1D /var>: faire en sorte que l'astromancie s'implante à Ishgard. Retournez au collège Saint-Guenriol et parlez à Jannequinard.

source:
TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_06<tab>You speak with Jannequinard one last time. After considering the danger Leveva now finds herself in, Jannequinard agrees to teach you a more potent form of the spell Malefic.

※The next astrologian quest will be available from Jannequinard upon reaching level 56.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_SEQ_06<tab>Il reste du chemin à parcourir avant que la conférence sur l'astromancie ait lieu, mais vous êtes sur la bonne voie. Continuez à vous entraîner et n'abandonnez pas<var 1D /var>!
* Jannequinard propose la prochaine quête aux astromanciens de niveau 56.

target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Leveva, au Convictoire

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab>The Vault went and outdid themselves. The location for our next symposium? The Convictory─a makeshift camp for a band of bickering knights! I've spoken at length with Lady Leveva about how we might handle this second inconvenience so as not to meet the same fate we did in Falcon's Nest.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Figurez-vous que dame Leveva a repris du poil de la bête<var 1D /var>! Elle a décidé d'organiser une nouvelle conférence dès que possible.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>I fear the worst, but the lady believes that we may be approaching this all wrong─that we should embrace the situation and use it to our advantage. I believe she is merely unaccustomed to the thin alpine air and her wits are not in order. Perchance we should make for the camp and see for ourselves.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>Pour parvenir à ses fins, elle veut tenter de convaincre les chevaliers du Convictoire de l'écouter. Rejoignons-la sur place, vous voulez bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>Lady Leveva and Quimperain are already on their way to the western highlands. It would be remiss if we were to keep them waiting any longer. To the Convictory!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>Dame Leveva veut tenter de convaincre les chevaliers du Convictoire d'écouter son exposé sur l'astromancie. Rejoignons-la sur place, vous voulez bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_BALLOON_000_010<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_BALLOON_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_BALLOON_000_011<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_BALLOON_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab>I arrived not moments ago to find this! What in the Fury's name has happened here!?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab>Attention à vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Nous ne sommes pas vraiment les bienvenus ici.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_010<tab>Tread lightly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This is not the work of bandits. Quimperain's hurts were dealt by the <var 1A 02 /var>Convictors<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_010<tab>Mauvaise nouvelle, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Quimperain s'est fait agresser alors qu'il essayait de rameuter des spectateurs pour ma conférence.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_011<tab>You were assaulted by the men sworn to protect us? This is madness!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_011<tab>Les chevaliers du Convictoire ont cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment cru que nous allions les aider à chasser les dragons. Maintenant, ils nous prennent pour des charlatans.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_012<tab>The Vault led the knights to believe that a party of astrologians would be arriving to aid them in scrying the location of the Horde's next attack. They took out their frustration on poor Quimperain when they learned I can foretell the whims of a dragon about as well as I can those of Jannequinard.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_012<tab>Nous devons leur prouver que nos compétences vont bien au-delà de celles des astrologues d'Ishgard. Que diriez-vous de soigner quelques blessés avec un sort de Bienfaisance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_013<tab>But no. We must not let this discourage us. If words have no weight with these men, then let our magicks do the speaking.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_013<tab>De nombreux chevaliers ne ressortent pas indemnes de leurs af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ments contre les dragons. Montrez-leur que l'astromancie pourrait leur être d'un grand secours.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_020<tab>May the stars heal your wounds!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_020<tab>Admirez le pouvoir de l'astromancie...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_020<tab>Close your eyes. Soon, it will all be over...ah, better. Better.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_020<tab>Ne bougez pas et laissez-moi m'occuper de vos blessures...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDA02022_100_020<tab>Ouch! Me leg! Just cut the damned thing off! I cannae take much more of this!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDA02022_100_020<tab>Argh... J'ai tellement mal...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDA02022_000_020<tab>The pain... It's gone! How did you...?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDA02022_000_020<tab>Merci beaucoup, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Vous êtes d'une gentillesse rare<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDB02022_100_020<tab>Give me a swift death... That's...all...I ask...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDB02022_100_020<tab>Aïe<var 1D /var>! Aïe aïe aïe...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDB02022_000_020<tab>But you're an astrologian. You can't heal people! That's not what astrologians do!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDB02022_000_020<tab>Ça alors... L'astromancie est bien plus efficace que je ne l'aurais cru. Merci, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDC02022_100_020<tab>Leave me... I am not much longer for this realm...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDC02022_100_020<tab>Au... Au secours...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDC02022_000_020<tab>My wounds...it is as if they were never there! Wait... Who's going to believe that I slew a dragon if I haven't the wounds to show for it!? I don't know whether to thank you, or slit your throat. Though, I suppose I wouldn't be able to do either if you hadn't healed me with those queer magicks, so this day, I see fit to forgive you.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_WOUNDEDC02022_000_020<tab>Merci infiniment, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. J'avais tort de douter du pouvoir de l'astromancie.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_030<tab>You...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_030<tab>Aaaaah<var 1D /var>! Éloignez-vous, vite<var 1D /var>! Ne restez pas ici... argh...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_031<tab>What is wrong, Leveva? Have you tapped too deeply into your mental reserves? Perhaps you should take a moment of respite.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_031<tab>Dame Leveva, que se passe-t-il<var 1D /var>!? Vous vous sentez mal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_QUIMPERAIN_000_032<tab>That blood is not the knight's!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_QUIMPERAIN_000_032<tab>M-mais vous êtes blessée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_033<tab>(-Sharlayan Assassin-)Ah, the loyal lapdog. Without you to state the obvious, where would your masters be, pray tell?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_033<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Comme on se retrouve... Vous êtes de bien piètres gardes du corps, croyez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_QUIMPERAIN_000_034<tab>You...again!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_QUIMPERAIN_000_034<tab>Ce tatouage... C'est toi qui nous poursuis depuis le début<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_035<tab>(-Sharlayan Assassin-)One might think these markings would betray my identity, but you Eorzeans have a singular capacity to look without seeing. I am amazed you are not constantly wandering into bonfires or off cliffs.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_035<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Nous étions amenés à nous revoir tôt ou tard, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Mais je vous promets que vous n'entendrez plus jamais parler de moi si cette demoiselle accepte de rentrer bien sagement à Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_036<tab>(-Celie-)I have grown weary of this masquerade, and I am done with entrusting my fate to this realm's blundering mercenaries. My name is Celie, and I am here to take the Lady Leveva into custody so that she can be transported back to Sharlayan and tried for her crimes.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_036<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Notre devoir est de punir toutes celles et ceux qui osent désobéir au conseil des Sages de Sharlayan, en allant propager l'astromancie sans au<var 16 /var>to<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion. C'est ton cas, ainsi que celui de ton grand-père qui est déjà entre leurs mains.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_037<tab>Taken into custody? On whose authority?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_037<tab>Et pourquoi attendrais-je leur au<var 16 /var>to<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion puisqu'ils me la refuseront à tous les coups<var 1D /var>? Je n'ai que faire de leur avis<var 1D /var>! Je suis assez grande pour agir toute seule, mettez-vous bien ça dans le crâne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_038<tab>(-Celie-)You are here without permission of the Forum, performing acts which amount to treason. Your grandfather has already been detained and questioned.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_038<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Pauvre idiote... Comme si tu pouvais contrôler quoi que ce soit<var 1D /var>! Mon maître ne le permettra jamais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_039<tab>(-Celie-)I am giving you the opportunity to turn yourself in, and put an end to this farce, once and for all. Do as I say, and no one will be harmed. Yourself included, Lady Leveva.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_039<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Il suffit de voir le fiasco total qu'a été votre première conférence<var 1D /var>! J'avais l'intention de m'occuper de toi à ce moment-là, mais il y avait tellement peu de monde que j'ai dû renoncer pour ne pas me faire repérer, haha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_040<tab>But Lady Leveva... I thought you and your grandfather were dispatched on an official expedition...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_040<tab>Voilà donc qui se cachait derrière ces chevaliers blessés...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_041<tab>(-Celie-)It seems that Leveva has not told you everything. Did you know that it was her father who was killed nearly fifteen summers past? <var 1A 02 /var>Fifteen summers past<var 1A 01 /var>, Jannequinard. Your adventurer friend seems already to have put two and two together. Why <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> didn't tell you earlier, I cannot fathom. What else are they leaving you out of, Jannequinard de Durendaire?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_041<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Mon maître ne veut que ton bien, Leveva... Il n'a pas envie que tu finisses comme ton père qui avait les mêmes lubies que toi, si tu vois ce que je veux dire...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_042<tab>I... But... Silence!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_042<tab>V-vous voulez dire que l'astromancien assassiné était le père de dame Leveva<var 1D /var>!? Mais c'est une ignominie<var 1D /var>! Vous allez payer pour vos crimes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_043<tab>(-Celie-)This is my final warning. When you see me again, you will either give yourself up, or you will die at my blade. Think on that, Leveva.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_CELIE_000_043<tab>(-Arcaniste des mers du Nord-)Ceci est notre dernier avertissement<var 1D /var>! Abandonnez votre folle idée de révéler les secrets de l'astromancie au monde, ou vous le paierez très cher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Lady Leveva's wound is deep. I do not believe I can heal it on my own. Lend me your aid!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, nous devons porter secours à dame Leveva im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_048<tab>I lack the capacity to heal Lady Leveva on my own. We must combine our Benefic magicks!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_048<tab>Par pitié, dépêchez-vous de soigner dame Leveva<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_049<tab>I have not the skill to heal Lady Leveva on my own. You must cast your magicks on her as well!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_049<tab>Par pitié, dépêchez-vous de soigner dame Leveva<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_050<tab>Thank you, my friends... For someone who claims she was hired to bring me back to Sharlayan, her aim was quite true...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_050<tab>Merci beaucoup... Ne vous inquiétez pas, je n'ai plus mal du tout.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_051<tab>Lady Leveva... This Celie claimed that you are not here with the blessing of the Forum... Is this so? Why did you not see fit to mention this?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_051<tab>Je suis vraiment navré... Par ma faute, vous avez failli être assassinée comme votre pauvre père. Si seulement j'avais pu deviner que le conseil des Sages était derrière tout ça...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_052<tab>My grandfather knew the Forum would never allow us to come to Ishgard, and that their “contemplation” over the matter was merely a tactic to stall and discourage us. The stars had spoken to my grandfather, and he was not about to turn a deaf ear to them. I kept silent because I did not wish to let the petty politicking of men thousands of malms to the north stand in the way of our dream─our dream to spread the word of Sharlayan astrology.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_052<tab>Oubliez ça, Jannequinard. J'ai choisi mon destin et cela n'a rien à voir avec vous. Je dois réaliser le rêve de mon père, quels que soient les obstacles que le conseil mettra en travers de mon chemin.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_053<tab>And such was my father's dream...until he was killed for it by closed-minded peasants.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_053<tab>Depuis le jour où ce vieil homme nous a raconté l'histoire de cet astromancien assassiné par des Ishgardais, je me doutais bien qu'il s'agissait de mon père...

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_054<tab>But Rufin never once spoke ill of those he wished to enlighten. Even at his end...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_054<tab>... Quoi qu'il en soit, sachez que Rufin a tout fait pour Ishgard, jusqu'au jour où le destin l'a rattrapé.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_055<tab>How do you know my father's name!?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_055<tab>Jannequinard<var 1D /var>! Comment connaissez-vous le nom de mon père<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_056<tab>Your father and I became close friends when I was in Sharlayan. When the exodus forced me to return home, he asked if he could accompany me, saying that he wished to try and convince those who once believed in the stars' power to look to the skies again. And we did for several moons. My countrymen were deeply skeptical, and slow to warm to the idea of heathen magicks─some were even rude─but he never gave up on them. Right up until he was...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_056<tab>Nous avons étudié ensemble au collège d'astromancie de Sharlayan. Il était tellement enthousiaste à l'idée que l'astromancie puisse fleurir à Ishgard... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, il nous a quittés beaucoup trop tôt pour voir son rêve se réaliser.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_057<tab>I was there during your father's last moments. I heard a commotion come from his room late one night and went in to check...only to find him bleeding and slumped over his diary, which he was writing when he was attacked. With his last strength, he handed me the diary and asked that I do not blame my people, and that I continue our work. I believe this belongs with you now.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_057<tab>Avant de partir pour le royaume des étoiles, votre père m'a confié son journal. Il m'a aidé à tenir le coup durant toutes ces années, mais je suppose qu'il vous revient de droit.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_058<tab>I do not know if I can forgive those who killed my father...
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_058<tab>Merci, Jannequinard. J'ai longtemps eu des sentiments mitigés à l'égard des Ishgardais, mais le fait de savoir que vous étiez le légataire de ce journal me rassure. Mon père vous considérait cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment comme un de ses amis les plus proches.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_059<tab>I do not expect you to forgive us yet but...but knowing that <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> did...even at the moment of his death...perhaps will help you one day understand. You have always reminded me of Rufin, even before I knew he was your father. Your passion for your discipline equals his own, or may even exceed it.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_059<tab>Je suis sincèrement désolé que certains de mes compatriotes aient été la source de votre malheur, mais je peux vous dire une chose<var 1D /var>: vous êtes la digne fille de Rufin. Votre volonté est in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble tout comme l'était la sienne.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_060<tab>Father... Did you know what fate awaited you in this realm? Did you see all this? Did the stars have you merely pave the way...for me?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_060<tab>Ce que vous dites me va droit au cœur. J'espère simplement que je continuerai à être digne de vos compliments.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_QUIMPERAIN_000_061<tab>If they did, then I shall not allow anyone to stand in your way.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_QUIMPERAIN_000_061<tab>N'oubliez pas que nous sommes là pour vous aider, Dame Leveva<var 1D /var>! À nous tous, je suis sûr que nous arriverons à réaliser le rêve de votre père<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_062<tab>You are right, good man. And so I shall allow this breach of etiquette, but if you fail to address Lady Leveva properly again, I'll have you spit shining the privy back at Durendaire Manor.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_062<tab>Eh bien, si même Quimperain se montre aussi enthousiaste, on peut dire que la bénédiction des étoiles est sur nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_063<tab>Oh, leave him be, Jannequinard. Without Quimperain, here, I'd have been tied up and shipped back to the Old World moons ago. The stars have him here with me. He is not going anywhere. And neither am I. I am done with symposiums. That is not what my father wanted. He came here not to speak of astrology, he came here to use it. And so that is what I shall do. There are still many Convictors who can benefit from these magicks.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_063<tab>Je sais ce que nous allons faire, Jannequinard. En guise de préparatifs, nous allons rester quelque temps dans ce campement pour soigner tous les chevaliers blessés. Je suis convaincue que beaucoup ouvriront les yeux sur l'astromancie après ça.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_064<tab>And what a better way to convince people of your greatness than by ensuring they remain alive long enough to sing your praises!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_064<tab>Cela me paraît être une excellente idée. Quimperain, je compte sur vous pour veiller sur dame Leveva comme il se doit et la protéger de tous ceux qui voudraient attenter à sa vie.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_065<tab>Janne... Will you...tell me of my father?
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_065<tab>Jannequinard... Lorsque vous aurez le temps, j'aimerais que vous me parliez de mon père.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_066<tab>I would be delighted, my lady...unless, that is, you mean <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>, as I have a prior engagement with a pair of lovely baronesses from House Dzemael, and I would not wish to keep them waiting.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_066<tab>Ce sera avec plaisir. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vous attendrai au collège.

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_069<tab>A prior arrangement... Of course he has! I suppose my father's journal will have to suffice until then.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_LEVEVA_000_069<tab>Je sens que je vais dévorer le journal de mon père d'une traite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_070<tab>To think that my old friend Rufin may have seen what grim fate awaited him in Ishgard...but chose to come anyway, knowing that it would inspire both me and his daughter... Gods, sometimes these celestial machinations are simply too grand in scope to grasp! However, if it is as we believe, then we must, as Quimperain so bluntly stated, make sure that naught disrupt us on our path to that fate.
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_070<tab>Je suis persuadé que dame Leveva parviendra à organiser une conférence digne de ce nom et à réaliser le rêve de son père. Que la bénédiction des étoiles soit sur elle et sur nous tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_071<tab>Perhaps it is time I revealed to you a more powerful form of Malefic, so that you might be better prepared for the trials that are to follow. Ah, that furrow upon your brow suggests you could have used this spell earlier in your training. In retrospect, I would be inclined to agree. Hah hah!
target: TEXT_JOBAST540_02022_JANNEQUINARD_000_071<tab>Mais avant cela, je vous conseille de continuer à vous entraîner en utilisant cette nouvelle technique, “Malfaisance II”. Il faut mettre toutes les chances de notre côté pour qu'Ishgard devienne une terre d'astromancie<var 1D /var>!
